# purchaseDate

**Instance Property**

The date of purchase for the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var purchaseDate: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

The purchase date applies to any type of in-app purchase.

## Getting Dates

- **cancelDate**: The date when the system refunded the transaction.
- **expirationDate**: The date a subscription expires.
